projects.title: House Price Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.description: Built a predictive model that estimates house prices based on features such as location, area, and number of bedrooms. Evaluated model performance using RMSE, MAE, and R² score; visualized results. Github: House Price Prediction

projects.title: Brain Tumor Detection and Classification using MRI & Quantum ML
projects.description: Served as Team Leader and Lead Developer for hybrid classical and quantum ML models in MRI brain tumor classification. Developed classical models (CNN, Random Forest) achieving 96% and 91% accuracy, respectively. Experimented with quantum models (VQC, QCNN, QNN), achieving approximately 59% accuracy. Authored a research paper analyzing and comparing model performance. Github: Classical , Quantum

summary: Information Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in software development, machine learning, and quantum computing. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, and ReactJS, with a strong track record of leading technical projects and research. Skilled in building data-driven solutions and collaborating in team environments to deliver impactful results.
